english.segment1: There were times in my life when I was confused. There were things between me and God that were blocking my view. So I prayed, "Oh dear Lord, take these things away so I can see.". He answered my prayer and at the sight of Him. I fell to my knees.
english.segment2: And until I went onto that fateful trip. I thought I was on a sinking ship.
english.segment3: Until, I went on a balloon ride. (I could see everything from up there). I went on a balloon ride. And now everything seems clear.
english.segment4: I strive towards infinity. Though sometimes I don't know what to do. When other people laugh at me. All I do is look towards You.
english.segment5: Well on my through this life yet something was gone. I looked round and round and then I found I needed some one. So I prayed, "Oh dear Lord, fill me up and make me whole. Present in my life Jesus Christ, save my soul."
